Package com.flipfit.business

Class FlipFitGymOwnerServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.FlipFitGymOwnerServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlipFitGymOwnerServiceInterface
public class FlipFitGymOwnerServiceImpl extends Object implements FlipFitGymOwnerServiceInterface
Service class for handling business logic for a Gym Owner. This class implements the FlipFitGymOwnerServiceInterface and provides concrete logic for each of the operations by interacting with the DAO layer.

    • getAllGymsOfOwner

      public List<Gym> getAllGymsOfOwner(String ownerId)
      Retrieves all gyms belonging to a specific owner. It fetches all gyms and then filters them based on the owner's ID.
      Specified by:
      getAllGymsOfOwner in interface FlipFitGymOwnerServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner.
      Returns:
